channel.title: Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.3.3 - Debian buster based - Testers Wanted!
channel.description:
Testers Wanted!
Download the Testers-Only version of Whonix for VirtualBox:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/VirtualBox_Testers_Only_Version
----
Alternatively, in-place release upgrade is possible, see https://forums.whonix.org/t/upgrade-whonix-virtualbox-14-whonix-virtualbox-15-testers-wanted/7132.
----
Other Whonix platforms version 15:
* https://forums.whonix.org/t/qubes-whonix-15-templatevms-debian-buster-based-4-0-1-201906232114-testers-wanted/7601/2

item.title: Whonix VirtualBox 15.0.0.3.3 - Debian buster based - Testers Wanted!
item.dc:creator: madaidan
item.description:
I just upgraded from Whonix 14 and it works fine. No errors so far.
